name: MySQL
description: The Sumo Logic App for MySQL is a unified logs and metrics app that helps you monitor the availability, performance and resource utilization of MySQL database clusters. Preconfigured dashboards and searches provide insight into the health of your MySQL clusters, replication status, error logs, query performance, slow queries, Innodb operations, failed logins and error logs.

search.queryText:
db_system=mysql db_cluster=* "User@Host" "Query_time"
| parse regex "(?<query_block># User@Host:[\S\s]+?SET timestamp=\d+;[\S\s]+?;)" multi
| parse regex field=query_block "# User@Host: \S+?\[(?<user>\S*?)\] @ (?<host_name>\S+)\s\[(?<ip_addr>\S*?)\]" nodrop // Pttrn1-vrtn1
| parse regex field=query_block "# User@Host: \S+?\[(?<user>\S*?)\] @\s+\[(?<ip_addr>\S*?)\]\s+Id:\s+(?<Id>\d{1,10})" nodrop // Pttrn1-vrtn2
| parse regex field=query_block "# User@Host: \S+?\[(?<user>\S*?)\] @ (?<host_name>\S+)\s\[(?<ip_addr>\S*?)\]\s+Id:\s+(?<Id>\d{1,10})" // Pttrn1-vrtn3
| count by db_cluster, ip_addr, host_name
| where !isEmpty(ip_addr)
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_name, state, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip=ip_addr
| where !isNull(latitude)

children.name: MySQL - Crash Recovery Attempts by Host

search.queryText:
db_system=mysql db_cluster=* "Starting crash recovery"
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| where mesg matches "*Starting crash recovery*"
| _sourceHost as Host
| count as recovery_attempts by Host, db_cluster 
| Sort by recovery_attempts

children.name: MySQL - Error Logs
children.description: The MySQL - Error Logs dashboard provides insight into database error logs by specifically monitoring database shutdown/start events, errors over time, errors, warnings and crash recovery attempts.
children.title: MySQL - Error Logs

queries.queryString:
db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} (Error or Warning or Note or Info or Information or DEBUG or CRITICAL)
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| where touppercase(ErrorLogtype) in ("ERROR", "WARNING", "NOTE", "INFO", "INFORMATION", "DEBUG", "CRITICAL")
| timeslice 1h
| count by _timeslice, ErrorLogtype
| transpose row _timeslice column ErrorLogType

db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} "[ERROR]"
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)"
| where ErrorLogtype="ERROR"
| parse field=ErrorMsg "[*] [*] *" as err_code, subsystem, error_message nodrop
| if (!isEmpty(error_message), error_message, ErrorMsg) as error_message
| count as frequency by error_message, db_cluster, err_code, subsystem
| sort by frequency, error_message asc
| limit 30

db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} "[Warning]"
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)"
| where ErrorLogtype="Warning" 
| parse field=ErrorMsg "[*] [*] *" as err_code, subsystem, ErrorMessage nodrop
| if (!isEmpty(ErrorMessage), ErrorMessage, ErrorMsg) as warning_message
| count as frequency by warning_message, db_cluster, err_code, subsystem
| sort by frequency, warning_message asc
| limit 30

panels.title: Server Start and Shutdown Events Over Time

queries.queryString:
db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} mysqld ("ready for connections." or "Shutdown complete" or "Terminated." or "Normal shutdown" or "Shutting down" or "starting as process")
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*ready for connections.*", "Up","Unknown") as server_status
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*Terminated.*", "Down", server_status) as server_status
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*Normal shutdown*", "Shutting Down", server_status) as server_status
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*Shutting down*", "Shutting Down", server_status) as server_status
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*Shutdown complete*", "Down", server_status) as server_status
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*starting as process*", "Starting",server_status) as server_status
| timeslice 15m
| count by _timeslice, server_status
| transpose row _timeslice column server_status

db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} "Starting crash recovery"
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| _sourceHost as Host
| timeslice 1h
| count as recovery_attempts by _timeslice

db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} mysqld ("ready for connections."  or "Terminated." or "Shutdown complete" or "Normal shutdown")
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*ready for connections.*", "Up","Unknown") as server_status
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*Terminated.*", "Down", server_status) as server_status
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*Normal shutdown*", "Shutting Down", server_status) as server_status
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*Shutdown complete*", "Down", server_status) as server_status
| _sourceHost as Host
| timeslice 100s
| withtime server_status | withtime _messagetime
| most_recent(server_status_withtime) as server_status, most_recent(_messagetime_withtime) as m_time by Host, db_cluster
| formatDate(fromMillis(m_time), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss:SSS Z") as event_time
| ((toMillis(now())-m_time)/(1000*60)) as since_mins | format("%.2f", since_mins) as since_minutes
| concat ("Since ", since_minutes, " minutes") as remark
| where server_status != "Up"
| fields - m_time, since_mins, since_minutes 
| fields Host, event_time, server_status, remark, db_cluster

db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} ("ERROR" or "CRITICAL") 
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| logreduce(mesg) by db_cluster limit=20
| _count as count | fields -_count | sort by count, signature asc

children.name: MySQL - Failed Logins
children.description: The MySQL - Failed Logins dashboard provides insights into all failed login attempts by location, users and hosts.
children.title: MySQL - Failed Logins

queries.queryString:
db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} Access denied for user
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using password: YES)" as user, ip_address
| count as failed_login_event_count

db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} Access denied for user
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using password: YES)" as user, ip_address
| timeslice 1s
| count as event_count by _timeslice, user, ip_address, db_cluster
| sort by _timeslice

db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} Access denied for user
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using password: YES)" as user, ip_address
| timeslice 1h
| count as event_count by _timeslice

| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using password: YES)" as user, ip_address

db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} Access denied for user
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)" nodrop

| lookup latitude, longitude, country_name, state, city from geo://location on ip = ip_address
| where !isNull(latitude)

children.name: MySQL - Number of Replication Completion Events by Host

search.queryText:
db_system=mysql db_cluster=* "Slave SQL thread" "because it reached its UNTIL position"
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "Slave SQL thread * because it reached its UNTIL position *" as State, StoppedUntilPosition
| timeslice 3h
| count by _timeslice, _sourceHost, db_cluster
| transpose row _timeslice column _sourceHost, db_cluster

children.name: MySQL - Replication
children.description: The MySQL - Replication dashboard provides insights into the state of database replication.
children.title: MySQL - Replication

queries.queryString:
db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} "[Note]" "SQL thread"
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "Slave SQL thread for channel '' *, starting replication in log * at position *, relay log * position: *" as State,ReplicationLog,ReplicationPosition,RelayLog,RelayPosition nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "Slave SQL thread for channel '' exiting, replication * in log * at position *" as State,ReplicationLog,StoppedUntilPosition nodrop
| where state in ("starting", "stopped")
| timeslice 1h as date
| count as event_count by date, state | fillmissing timeslice(1h) in date,values("starting","stopped") in State 
| formatDate(date, "MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss") as Date
| transpose row Date column state as starting, stopped

db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} (("[ERROR]" and ("Slave I/O" or "Error reading packet from server" or "Slave SQL")) or ("[Note] Error reading relay log event: slave SQL thread was killed"))
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| ErrorMsg as error_message
| count as frequency by error_message, db_cluster
| sort by frequency

db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} ("[Note]" or ("[ERROR]" ("Slave I/O" or "Error reading packet from server" or "Slave SQL")))
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "Slave SQL thread initialized, * replication in log '*' at position *, relay log '*' position: *" as State,ReplicationLog,ReplicationPosition,ReplayLog,RelayPosition nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "Slave SQL thread * because it reached its UNTIL position *" as State, StoppedUntilPosition nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "Error reading relay log event: slave SQL thread was *" as state nodrop
| if(_raw matches "*[ERROR] Slave I/O*" or _raw matches "*[ERROR] Error reading packet from server*"  or _raw matches "*[ERROR] Slave SQL*" or _raw matches "* [ERROR] * Slave I/O*" or _raw matches "* Error reading packet from server*"  or _raw matches "* [ERROR] * Slave SQL*","failed",state) as state
| where state in ("starting", "stopped", "killed", "failed")
| timeslice 1h
| count by _timeslice, state
| transpose row _timeslice column state
| fillmissing timeslice(1h)

search.queryText:
db_system=mysql db_cluster=* "[ERROR]" ("Slave I/O" or "Error reading packet from server" or "Slave SQL")
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| where ErrorLogtype="ERROR"
| parse field=ErrorMsg "*: error * to master '*' - retry-time: * retries: *, Error_code: *" as subsystem, action, Master, Retry_time, Retries, Error_code nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "*: Got fatal error *, Error_code: *" as subsystem, Error_Msg, Error_code nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "*: * ( server_errno=*)" as subsystem, Error_Msg, Error_code nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "*: The slave I/O thread stops because *. Error:*, Error_code: *" as subsystem, Error_Msg_details, Error_Msg, Error_code nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "*: * Default database: '*'. Query: '*', Error_code: *" as subsystem, Error_Msg, Default_Database, Query, Error_code nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "*: Cou*d not execute *" as subsystem, f1, Error_Msg nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "*: Master command *, Error_code: *" as subsystem, Error_Msg, Error_code nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "* thread couldn't register on master" as subsystem nodrop
| timeslice 1h
| _sourceHost as host
| count by _timeslice, host, db_cluster
| transpose row _timeslice column host, db_cluster

db_system=mysql db_cluster=* (("[NOTE]" or "[ERROR]" ("Slave I/O" or "Error reading packet from server" or "Slave SQL")))
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "Slave SQL thread for channel '*' initialized, * replication in log '*' at position *, relay log '*' position: *" as channel, replication_state, ReplicationLog, ReplicationPosition, ReplayLog, RelayPosition nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "Slave SQL thread * because it reached its UNTIL position *" as replication_state, StoppedUntilPosition nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "Error reading relay log event: slave SQL thread was *" as replication_state nodrop
| if(_raw matches "*[ERROR]* Slave I/O*" or _raw matches "*[ERROR]* Error reading packet from server*"  or _raw matches "*[ERROR]* Slave SQL*","failed", replication_state) as replication_state
| where replication_state in ("starting", "stopped", "killed", "failed")
| if (replication_state in ("starting", "stopped"), "Up", "Down") as replication_state
| _sourceHost as Host
| withtime replication_state | withtime _messagetime
| most_recent(replication_state_withtime) as replication_state, most_recent(_messagetime_withtime) as m_time by host, db_cluster
| formatDate(fromMillis(m_time), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss:SSS Z") as event_time
| ((toMillis(now())-m_time)/(1000*60*60)) as since_hours | format("%.2f", since_hours) as since_hours
| concat ("Since ", since_hours, " hours") as remark
| fields - m_time 
| fields db_cluster, host, event_time, replication_state, remark

db_system=mysql db_cluster=* mysqld ("ready for connections." or "Shutdown complete" or "Terminated." or "Normal shutdown" or "Shutting down" or "starting as process")
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*ready for connections.*", "Up","Unknown") as server_status
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*Terminated.*", "Down", server_status) as server_status
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*Normal shutdown*", "Shutting Down", server_status) as server_status
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*Shutting down*", "Shutting Down", server_status) as server_status
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*Shutdown complete*", "Down", server_status) as server_status
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*starting as process*", "Starting",server_status) as server_status
| _sourceHost as host
| timeslice 15m
| withtime server_status | withtime _messagetime
| most_recent(server_status_withtime) as server_status, most_recent(_messagetime_withtime) as m_time by host, db_cluster
| formatDate(fromMillis(m_time), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss:SSS Z") as event_time
| ((toMillis(now())-m_time)/(1000*60*60)) as since_hours | format("%.2f", since_hours) as since_hours
| concat ("Since ", since_hours, " hours") as remark
| fields - m_time 
| fields host, event_time, server_status, remark, db_cluster

children.name: MySQL - Server Up-Down Events by Host

search.queryText:
db_system=mysql db_cluster=* mysqld ("ready for connections." or "Shutdown complete" or "Terminated." or "Normal shutdown" or "Shutting down" or "starting as process")
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*ready for connections.*", "Up","Unknown") as server_status
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*Terminated.*", "Down", server_status) as server_status
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*Normal shutdown*", "Shutting Down", server_status) as server_status
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*Shutting down*", "Shutting Down", server_status) as server_status
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*Shutdown complete*", "Down", server_status) as server_status
| if (ErrorMsg matches "*starting as process*", "Starting",server_status) as server_status
| _sourceHost as Host
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messagetime), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss.SSS Z")  as event_time
| count by host, event_time, server_status, db_cluster
| sort by host, event_time, server_status, db_cluster
| fields - _count

children.name: MySQL - Slow Queries
children.description: The MySQL Slow Queries dashboard provides insights into all slow queries executed on the database.
children.title: MySQL - Slow Queries

queries.queryString:
db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} "User@Host" "Query_time"  
| parse regex "(?<query_block># User@Host:[\S\s]+?SET timestamp=\d+;[\S\s]+?;)" multi
| parse regex field=query_block "# User@Host: \S+?\[(?<user>\S*?)\] @ (?<host_name>\S+)\s\[(?<ip_addr>\S*?)\]" nodrop // Pttrn1-vrtn1
| parse regex field=query_block "# User@Host: \S+?\[(?<user>\S*?)\] @\s+\[(?<ip_addr>\S*?)\]\s+Id:\s+(?<Id>\d{1,10})" nodrop // Pttrn1-vrtn2
| parse regex field=query_block "# User@Host: \S+?\[(?<user>\S*?)\] @ (?<host_name>\S+)\s\[(?<ip_addr>\S*?)\]\s+Id:\s+(?<Id>\d{1,10})" // Pttrn1-vrtn3
| parse regex field=query_block "Schema: (?<schema>(?:\S*|\s)?)\s*Last_errno[\s\S]+?Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_affected:\s+(?<rows_affected>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_read:\s+(?<rows_read>[\d.]*)\n" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn1
| parse regex field=query_block "Schema: (?<schema>(?:\S*|\s)?)\s*Last_errno[\s\S]+?\s+Killed:\s+\d+\n" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn2
| parse regex field=query_block "Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d]*)\s+Rows_affected:\s+(?<rows_affected>[\d]*)\s+" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn3
| parse regex field=query_block "Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d]*)" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn4
| num(query_time) as query_time
| where query_time >= {{slow_query_latency}}
| fields -query_block
| count as frequency by ip_addr 
| where !isEmpty(ip_addr)
| sort by frequency

db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} "User@Host" "Query_time"
| parse regex "(?<query_block># User@Host:[\S\s]+?SET timestamp=\d+;[\S\s]+?;)" multi
| parse regex field=query_block "# User@Host: \S+?\[(?<user>\S*?)\] @ (?<host_name>\S+)\s\[(?<ip_addr>\S*?)\]" nodrop // Pttrn1-vrtn1
| parse regex field=query_block "# User@Host: \S+?\[(?<user>\S*?)\] @\s+\[(?<ip_addr>\S*?)\]\s+Id:\s+(?<Id>\d{1,10})" nodrop // Pttrn1-vrtn2
| parse regex field=query_block "# User@Host: \S+?\[(?<user>\S*?)\] @ (?<host_name>\S+)\s\[(?<ip_addr>\S*?)\]\s+Id:\s+(?<Id>\d{1,10})" // Pttrn1-vrtn3
| parse regex field=query_block "Schema: (?<schema>(?:\S*|\s)?)\s*Last_errno[\s\S]+?Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_affected:\s+(?<rows_affected>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_read:\s+(?<rows_read>[\d.]*)\n" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn1
| parse regex field=query_block "Schema: (?<schema>(?:\S*|\s)?)\s*Last_errno[\s\S]+?\s+Killed:\s+\d+\n" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn2
| parse regex field=query_block "Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d]*)\s+Rows_affected:\s+(?<rows_affected>[\d]*)\s+" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn3
| parse regex field=query_block "Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d]*)" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn4
| num(query_time) as query_time
| where query_time >= {{slow_query_latency}}
| fields -query_block
| count as frequency by user | sort by frequency

db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} "User@Host" "Query_time"
| parse regex "(?<query_block># User@Host:[\S\s]+?SET timestamp=\d+;[\S\s]+?;)" multi
| parse regex field=query_block "Schema: (?<schema>(?:\S*|\s)?)\s*Last_errno[\s\S]+?Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_affected:\s+(?<rows_affected>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_read:\s+(?<rows_read>[\d.]*)\n" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn1
| parse regex field=query_block "Schema: (?<schema>(?:\S*|\s)?)\s*Last_errno[\s\S]+?\s+Killed:\s+\d+\n" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn2
| parse regex field=query_block "Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d]*)\s+Rows_affected:\s+(?<rows_affected>[\d]*)\s+" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn3
| parse regex field=query_block "Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d]*)" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn4
| num(query_time) as query_time
| where query_time >= {{slow_query_latency}}
| _sourceHost as Host
| fields -query_block
| count as queries_count by Host 
| sort by queries_count

db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} "User@Host" "Query_time"
| parse regex "(?<query_block># User@Host:[\S\s]+?SET timestamp=\d+;[\S\s]+?;)" multi
| parse regex field=query_block "Schema: (?<schema>(?:\S*|\s)?)\s*Last_errno[\s\S]+?Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_affected:\s+(?<rows_affected>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_read:\s+(?<rows_read>[\d.]*)\n" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn1
| parse regex field=query_block "Schema: (?<schema>(?:\S*|\s)?)\s*Last_errno[\s\S]+?\s+Killed:\s+\d+\n" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn2
| parse regex field=query_block "Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d]*)\s+Rows_affected:\s+(?<rows_affected>[\d]*)\s+" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn3
| parse regex field=query_block "Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d]*)" // Pttrn2-vrtn4
| num(query_time)
| 15 as threshold // customize if need different value. As an example query taking more than 15 Seconds is considered as Excessive Slow. 
| where (query_time >= threshold)
| _sourceHost as Host
| fields -query_block
| count as queries_count by Host | sort by queries_count

db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} "User@Host" "Query_time"
| parse regex "(?<query_block># User@Host:[\S\s]+?SET timestamp=\d+;[\S\s]+?;)" multi
| parse regex field=query_block "SET timestamp=(?<set_timestamp>\d*);(?:\\n|\n)(?<sql_cmd>[\s\S]*);" nodrop
| parse regex field=query_block "Schema: (?<schema>(?:\S*|\s)?)\s*Last_errno[\s\S]+?Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_affected:\s+(?<rows_affected>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_read:\s+(?<rows_read>[\d.]*)\n" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn1
| parse regex field=query_block "Schema: (?<schema>(?:\S*|\s)?)\s*Last_errno[\s\S]+?\s+Killed:\s+\d+\n" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn2
| parse regex field=query_block "Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d]*)\s+Rows_affected:\s+(?<rows_affected>[\d]*)\s+" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn3
| parse regex field=query_block "Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d]*)" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn4
| num(query_time) as query_time
| where query_time >= {{slow_query_latency}}
| parse regex field=sql_cmd "[^a-zA-Z]*(?<sql_cmd_type>[a-zA-Z]+)(?:\s|\\n|\n)" nodrop
| parse field=sql_cmd "# administrator command: *" as admn_sql_cmd
| if (sql_cmd matches "# administrator command: *", admn_sql_cmd, sql_cmd_type) as sql_cmd_type
| toUpperCase(sql_cmd_type)
| fields -query_block
| count as frequency group by sql_cmd_type | sort by frequency

panels.title: Top 10 Slow Queries by Average Execution Time

queries.queryString:
db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} "User@Host" "Query_time"  
| parse regex "(?<query_block># User@Host:[\S\s]+?SET timestamp=\d+;[\S\s]+?;)" multi
| parse regex field=query_block "# User@Host: \S+?\[(?<user>\S*?)\] @ (?<host_name>\S+)\s\[(?<ip_addr>\S*?)\]" nodrop // Pttrn1-vrtn1
| parse regex field=query_block "# User@Host: \S+?\[(?<user>\S*?)\] @\s+\[(?<ip_addr>\S*?)\]\s+Id:\s+(?<Id>\d{1,10})" nodrop // Pttrn1-vrtn2
| parse regex field=query_block "# User@Host: \S+?\[(?<user>\S*?)\] @ (?<host_name>\S+)\s\[(?<ip_addr>\S*?)\]\s+Id:\s+(?<Id>\d{1,10})" // Pttrn1-vrtn3
| parse regex field=query_block "Schema: (?<schema>(?:\S*|\s)?)\s*Last_errno[\s\S]+?Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_affected:\s+(?<rows_affected>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_read:\s+(?<rows_read>[\d.]*)\n" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn1
| parse regex field=query_block "Schema: (?<schema>(?:\S*|\s)?)\s*Last_errno[\s\S]+?\s+Killed:\s+\d+\n" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn2
| parse regex field=query_block "Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d]*)\s+Rows_affected:\s+(?<rows_affected>[\d]*)\s+" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn3
| parse regex field=query_block "Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d]*)" // Pttrn2-vrtn4
| parse regex field=query_block "# Bytes_sent:\s+(?<bytes_sent>\d*)\s+Tmp_tables:\s+(?<tmp_tables>\d*)\s+Tmp_disk_tables:\s+(?<temp_disk_tables>\d*)\s+Tmp_table_sizes:\s+(?<tmp_table_sizes>\d*)\n" nodrop // Pttrn3-vrtn1
| parse regex field=query_block "# Bytes_sent:\s+(?<bytes_sent>\d*)\n" nodrop // Pttrn3-vrtn2
| parse regex field=query_block "SET timestamp=(?<set_timestamp>\d*);(?:\\n|\n)(?<sql_cmd>[\s\S]*);" nodrop
| fields -query_block
| avg(query_time) as avg_time, sum(query_time) as total_time, min(query_time) as min_time, max(query_time) as max_time, avg(rows_examined) as avg_rows_examined, avg(rows_sent) as avg_rows_sent, avg(Lock_Time) as avg_lock_time, count as frequency group by sql_cmd, db_cluster
| where avg_time >= {{slow_query_latency}}
| sort by avg_time | limit 10

panels.title: Performance Schema - Table Lock Waits
panels.text:
##Performance Schema - Table Lock Waits
An internal lock corresponds to a lock in the SQL layer. Internal lock can be for : read normal, read with shared locks, read high priority, read no insert, write allow write, write concurrent insert, write delayed, write low priority, write normal An external lock corresponds to a lock in the storage engine layer. External lock can be for: read external, write external

children.name: MySQL - Overview
children.description: The MySQL Overview dashboard gives you an at-a-glance view of the state of your database clusters by monitoring key cluster information such as errors, failed logins, errors, queries executed, slow queries, lock waits, uptime and more.
children.title: MySQL - Overview

queries.queryString:
db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} "User@Host" "Query_time"  
| parse regex "(?<query_block># User@Host:[\S\s]+?SET timestamp=\d+;[\S\s]+?;)" multi
| parse regex field=query_block "Schema: (?<schema>(?:\S*|\s)?)\s*Last_errno[\s\S]+?Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_affected:\s+(?<rows_affected>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_read:\s+(?<rows_read>[\d.]*)\n" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn1
| parse regex field=query_block "Schema: (?<schema>(?:\S*|\s)?)\s*Last_errno[\s\S]+?\s+Killed:\s+\d+\n" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn2
| parse regex field=query_block "Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d]*)\s+Rows_affected:\s+(?<rows_affected>[\d]*)\s+" nodrop // Pttrn2-vrtn3
| parse regex field=query_block "Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d]*)" // Pttrn2-vrtn4
| fields -query_block
| num(query_time)
| 15 as threshold // customize if need different value. As an example query taking more than 15 Seconds is considered as Excessive Slow. 
| where query_time >= threshold | count as queries_count

db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} "[ERROR]"
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)"
| where ErrorLogtype="ERROR" | count as error_count

db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} (("[ERROR]" and ("Slave I/O" or "Error reading packet from server" or "Slave SQL")) or "[Note] Error reading relay log event: slave SQL thread was killed")
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| count as replication_failure_count

db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} "[Warning]" Access denied for user
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using password: YES)" as user, ip_address
| count as failed_login_count

db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} ("[Note]" or ("[ERROR]" ("Slave I/O" or "Error reading packet from server" or "Slave SQL")))
| json "log" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", log, _raw) as mesg
| parse regex field=mesg "\[(?<ErrorLogtype>[^\]]*)][\:]*\s(?<ErrorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "Slave SQL thread initialized, * replication in log '*' at position *, relay log '*' position: *" as State,ReplicationLog,ReplicationPosition,ReplayLog,RelayPosition nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "Slave SQL thread * because it reached its UNTIL position *" as State, StoppedUntilPosition nodrop
| parse field=ErrorMsg "Error reading relay log event: slave SQL thread was *" as state nodrop
| if(_raw matches "*[ERROR] Slave I/O*" or _raw matches "*[ERROR] Error reading packet from server*"  or _raw matches "*[ERROR] Slave SQL*" or _raw matches "* [ERROR] * Slave I/O*" or _raw matches "* Error reading packet from server*"  or _raw matches "* [ERROR] * Slave SQL*","failed",state) as state
| where state in ("starting", "stopped", "killed", "failed")
| timeslice 1h
| count by _timeslice, state
| transpose row _timeslice column state
| fillmissing timeslice(1h)

db_system=mysql environment={{environment}} db_cluster={{db_cluster}} "User@Host" "Query_time"
| parse regex "(?<query_block># User@Host:[\S\s]+?SET timestamp=\d+;[\S\s]+?;)" multi
| timeslice 1h
| count as queries_count by _timeslice
environment={{environment}} metric=mysql_table_locks_waited db_cluster={{db_cluster}} | sum
